https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hzGvVotU0i4nERNdzZVgRhJzaZ1.jpg Maurizio, tiny, reckless and full of energy, grew up in the poorest outskirts of Reggio Calabria, he argues with spiteful hens, speaks to wise donkeys and fights for his dream: to play the snare drum in the neighbourhood band. Donkey Flies
